fn.p: Edited by: Marta Hernandez-Jover, Charles Sturt University, Australia
Reviewed by: Shankar Yadav, European Commission for the Control of Foot and Mouth Disease (EuFMD), Italy; Ana Alba Casals, Institute of Agrifood Research and Technology (IRTA), Spain
This article was submitted to Veterinary Epidemiology and Economics, a section of the journal Frontiers in Veterinary Science
